mean_cn: n.弊端；不利，不利地位，弱点
mean_en: something that causes problems and tends to stop somebody/something from succeeding or making progress; a bad or undesirable quality or feature
sentence: The biggest disadvantage of this job is that the office is so far away.
sentence_trans: 这份工作的最大的弊端是办公室太远了。
word_etyma: dis不，非 + advantage优点 → disadvantage缺点
